title: TheBeardedBaby
author: TheBeardedBaby
content: I've been following the development of this story for a few years now and more and more interesting facts are coming out. For those who never heard of The eye of Sahara, it's located in Mauritania, west part of Sahara desert in Africa. bigger size satellite photoJust click this oneImages source: wikipeidaThis place has been puzzling the scientists for years with it's incredible features, and somehow it is been away from the public interest.And here is how Plato was describing Altantis : Source of the image nrk.noHere's the new video which sums the last evidence pointing to Richat Structure as the capital of the missing Atlantis.

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Why search for a missing "Atlantis" when you already have one in existence today. Look at the Modern World like USA, Japan, Europe, China, etc. Â  It's the modern world which will be destroyed by fire unlike the other that was flooded.A New and Beautiful Earth will be recreated after the destruction.
